synopsis.text: Yuki’s and Kana’s life as twin sisters and roommates at their high school dormitory takes an unexpected turn with the arrival of an underclassman named Sakuya. Sakuya's long-held admiration for Yuki sets in motion a series of events that cause Yuki to confront her true feelings for her sister. As Sakuya seeks Yuki's support for her own feelings towards Kana, the sisters' bond is put to the test. Will their relationship endure, or will Sakuya's presence drive a wedge between them? Join Yuki, Kana, and Sakuya as they navigate the complexities of love and friendship in the heartwarming anime, Candy Boy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
